entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET January 2023 Updates #245
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21538 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #244

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vector512 tests for llvmfullaot run out of trampoline type 3 #80467
  • DotNet build produces different result then building in visual studio #80465
  • NativeAOT should generate conditional dependencies for the tag `required` #80464
  • The CustomAttributeTypeNameParser is not able to translate generics correctly #80462
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change visibility of ComWrappers.GetIUnknownImpl to public #80451
    8.0.0
  • EventListener unloadability #80450
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-21538 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #80449
  • RSA.SignHash does not reliably work with the Platform Crypto Provider #80444
  • Massive allocations of Func<Type, JsonTypeInfo> in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions+CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo(Type) #80430
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #80447
  • Regressions around IndexOf #80441
  • Linux Timer performance much worse than on Windows #80425
  • HttpClient exceptions are always culture specific #80424
  • Regressions in Span.IndexerBench #80445
  • Q: Type 'IconBufferEventArgs' has a ComVisible(false) parent 'System.EventArgs' in its hierarchy, therefore QueryInterface calls for IDispatch or class interfaces are disallowed #80422
  • [mono][aot] Deduplication of symbols #80419
    8.0.0
  • SSL RemoteCertificateNameMismatch error in a chroot build environment #80413
  • NativeAOT test infrastructure should mark indirect structures as Kept #80408
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [LSG] Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `out` parameter modifier is present #64665
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt have a way to remove all occurences of an attribute #80466
  • CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M13-RTM, CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M14-SP1, CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M15-SP2 (45 tests total) #80472
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79286
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a way to specify default JSON serialization for HttpClient #80415
  • Tracking issue for CI build failure "Installing openssl@3 has failed!" #80428
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not print mono_wasm_runtime_ready to console #63703
    8.0.0
  • In .NET 6, when ConfigureLogging SetMinimumLevel to LogLevel.Warning/Error/Critical, logger.IsEnabled(LogLevel.Warning/Error/Critical) can't get result rightly. #79798
    Future
  • WebApplicationBuilder ILoggingBuilder does not enable logging by default #80336
    Future
  • Unable to delete unloaded dll after using System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize with a Type from the dll. #80420
  • (An error occurred while deserializing the Fields property of class divitiae_api.Models.Item: Cannot dynamically create an instance of type 'System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonObject'. Reason: No parameterless constructor defined.) #80161
  • [API Proposal]: Add IsEnumerated property to IEnumerable<T> interface #80144
  • CryptoStream shouldn't flush when in read mode #80427
  • NativeAOT static linking produce too large files #80416
  • [API Proposal]: `KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>` override `GetHashCode`, `Equals` and operators #80058
  • Can the BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator be optimized? #69320
    Future
  • System.Text.Json fails to serialize and throws internal System.NullReferenceException #79978
  • .NET 7 AOT x86/x64 Unable to build a method of a generic class that returns Type #79710
    7.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RefSafetyRulesAttribute #76032
    8.0.0
  • Self-contained application not starting on ARM64 & Amazon Linux 2 #80404
  • SignedCms: throws when manipulating certificates collection that contains a non-X.509 certificate #79935

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove some split/substring/trim allocations from System.Net.* #80471
    area-System.Net
  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove some temp string allocations from Uri #80469
    area-System.Net
  • [JIT] - ARM64/X64 - Optimize 'x & -1' to a cast #80468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - TP Emitter improvement - Using 'FORCEINLINE' on 'emitAllocAnyInstr' #80463
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix marshaller types in attributes for exception marshallers and fix non-generic managed type with generic marshaller cases #80461
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Adds diagnostics to detect duplicated event names in LSG #80460
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix timeout in regex source generated test #80459
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix small buffer handling with the Platform Crypto Provider #80457
    area-System.Security
  • WASI gc - fix stack range #80456
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't upgrade homebrew packages in CI #80455
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Don't upgrade homebrew packages in CI #80454
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #80452
    area-Serialization
  • [mono][aot] Simplify the dedup code. #80442
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix NetFramework name in Directory.Build.targets #80440
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Backport FileStream finalization fixes #80439
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80438
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix delegate allocation in CachingContext.GetOrAddJsonTypeInfo #80437
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove Drawing.Common .NETCoreApp PNSEs #80435
    area-System.Drawing
  • [release/7.0] [workloads] Specify arm64 alias instead of arm in the arm64 pack #80434
  • [release/7.0] Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #80433
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Invalidate buffered data when bypassing the cache #80432
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fixed getting namespace names of array types. #80426
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80423
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] fix for generation info in GCMemoryInfo #80417
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.14
  • Have SIMD Load/Store use GT_IND and GT_ASG where possible #80411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Change github illink links #80407
    area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • Adds diagnostic for out parameter in LSG #80458
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add initial support for FreeBSD.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Reserve memory for FOH in-range" #80400
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #80453
    area-codeflow
  • Build tools subset to generate artifacts #80406
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in aot->interp transitions #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Increase test scenario invocation parallelism #80409
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Don't upgrade homebrew packages in CI #80443
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove Substring from EventSource.InitializeProviderMetadata #80386
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Reverting wrong commit changing the helloworld sample #80390
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [workloads] Specify arm64 alias instead of arm in the arm64 pack #79555
    area-Build-mono
  • measure the perf impact of deduplicating IsCompleted call in GetConsumingEnumerable #78887
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some string allocation from NormalizeServiceName #80384
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove Substrings from PhoneAttribute #80389
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2084187 #80405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] fix the addr error on embedded CPU. #80412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generate fewer TentativeInstanceMethod nodes #80414
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Libraries Feature Switches for DynamicCodeSupport #80397
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, linkable-framework
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove check for assembly name in p/invoke library load #80394
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rename some BinaryPrimitives files (and move some functions) #80381
  • Add public RefSafetyRulesAttribute #80379
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Get entry assembly name from host for GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #80301
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80321
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 7.0.x
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consistently use fgMakeMultiUse in the gtNewSimd*Node APIs #80242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Crash when region survives >2GB #80392
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Feature/logging messagetemplate compat #80364
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #79724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fixing compressed singlefile scenario on osx-arm64 #80283
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 7.0.3
  • Lowercase TargetOS #80164
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add tests for frozen collections #80395
    area-System.Collections
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use CompressionLevel.SmallestSize in Bundler #80372
    area-HostModel
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling tests #78010
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Refine json comment position for Utf8JsonWriter; Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Fix publishing of additional wasm files #2161
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to April 22 #2158

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK installs leave versioned directories at the root of %localappdata% on windows #29863
  • "dotnet watch" fails to start in Ubuntu 22.04 with .NET-SDK #29846
  • Preview features mechanism needs rework #29844
    Backlog

Closed

  • dotnet publish -p:PublishProfile=ClickOnceProfile error #28403
  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools failed - 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten' version '6.0.12' is lower than version '6.0.13' #29852
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082

PullRequests

Created

  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add *.swp to gitignore template #29866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #29862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • enforce codestyle on build by default #29860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #29858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #29855
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29853
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29836
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #29857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #29856
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the version of the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Worspaces used in the GenAPI #29847
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29837
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29835
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages & Change Culture For All Based on OS Main Language #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include dotnet-watch redist output in layouts #29611
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.1xx #29463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.2xx #29464
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    11.0
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add an open question about capturing instance of the enclosing type in a closure #6868
  • Update raw-string-literal.md #6867

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • US International Keyboard and double quotes #66346
  • Enabling inline diagnostics results in stale "Avoid multiple blank lines" diagnostic #66345
  • `Add null check` is offered for arguments with default value of `null` #66343
  • IncrementalGenerator caches ReferencedAssemblySymbols too aggressively #66341

Closed

  • Test failed in CI: CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.SortItemsByExpandedFlag #66339
  • Nullable value type receiver of a constrained call is unexpectedly copied #66162
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust closure initialization for primary constructor #66340
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Support task list priorities in LSP #66294
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust assert to account for error scenarios #66202
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix cancellation in test #66344
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Refactor GetCapturedParameters method into reusable and parameter specific classes. #66332
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Do not copy nullable value type receiver of a constrained call. #66311
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve logging of rude edits and write analysis log to disk #66318
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Improve VS settings integration test, fix deserialization of enum options from registry #66335
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Emit stackalloc block initializer for byte-sized enums #66251
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66338
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Update analyzers package version #65997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Annotate implementations of IRangeVariableSymbol #39202
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • [EnC] Follow up on deleting properties and events etc. #64034
    Area-Compilers
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Implemented `Make property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify and fix handing of references not yet added #66303
    Area-IDE
  • Report error referencing method from module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute version #66285
    Area-Compilers
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, 17.6

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: The user aborted a request. when Virtualize cancels the gRPC-Web call (Blazor WASM, net7 regression) #46011
  • Array will allocate less and little faster when creating RequestDelegateFactoryOptions in CreateRDFOptions #46010
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46005
  • Perf improvement: json #46004
  • CanHaveBody should be false for HTTP/2 CONNECT #46002
  • Unix socket not deleted at startup in Blazor.DevServer #46001
  • `Accept-Ranges` should not be returned when output caching is used #45999
  • Output caching should always vary by Accept-Encoding #45998
  • Centralize logic for template precedence/identity values #45995
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PasswordHasher CompatibilityMode IdentityV2 not working in .NET 6.0 #45994
  • Process terminated with error: Exception thrown from SocketAsyncEngine event loop #45988
  • Styles from library component get lost after hotreload #45987
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Electron will be disconnected frequently when using signlar #45990

Closed

  • SignalR Client Windows Authentication returning 401Unautorized (update 6.0.11 -> 7.0.0) #45371
    8.0-preview1
  • Cannot debug Chrome with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.DevServer 7.0.2 #45992
    7.0.x
  • SignalR Messagepack serialization issue #45991
  • Command-line build fails on Apple M1 silicon during the `restore.sh` step #40109
  • [Blazor] JS Interop in Blazor MAUI #45912
  • Log message on logout success incorrectly states "Login completed successfully." (Blazor WASM) #45846
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Apreciation for the empty templates that are now offered for blzor #45955
  • Perf regression: json, stage1vanilla #45975
  • Change disposed exceptions to use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf #43503
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Change argument null exceptions to use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #43482
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] [SignalR] Avoid Http2 when negotiate auth is used #46013
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • Call CloseAsync instead of CloseOutputAsync in the browser #46012
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #46009

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() when GraphicsView is inside a Grid. #12560
  • MauiImage resource as stream missing #12556
  • App crashes when navigating after the app has been in the background #12553
  • CSS styles are ignored when element's IsEnabled=false on initialization #12550
  • Unable to Build and Debug Android #12549
  • VerticalScrollbar not showing when scrollview is added to the child of contentview #12547
    Backlog
  • Investigate a way to detect bumps of assemblies that are also in VS #12546
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout causes application crash on launch if ShellContent is not the first item #12543
    Backlog
  • Heading not read out by screenreader on Android #12540
    Backlog
  • Can't use Entity Framework Core in iOS Release builds #12537
  • CollectionView.EmptyView does not display unless CollectionView placed within RefreshView #12535
    Backlog
  • Transparent background support in (blazor)webview component #12534

Closed

  • Entry properties CursorPosition and SelectionLength are not updated #7867
  • Label WordWrap does not work inside HorizontalStackLayout or StackLayout with horizontal orientation #10917
    Backlog
  • [Android] Crash using Bindable HorizontalStackLayout #4016
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] ScrollView is not longer visualised when placed inside VerticalStackLayout #8645
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • CheckBox control Color property not rendering correctly #9404
    Backlog
  • Add a NuGet packed to a project. for Android #11118
  • The bug WMC100 #11076
  • PushModelAsync and Shell GoToAsync is not working in .NET MAUI android while we are navigating to Tabbed page from content page #12541
  • Can't build class Library in release mode - error NETSDK1094 #12548
  • If you could I do like to ask you to give it a bit more thought. Are you using this today with another control? What properties would you like to see to influence the clustering behavior? How do you like annotations to work? #12544
  • Shell Flyout causes application crash on launch if ShellContent is not the first item #12542
  • [MacCatalyst] `Authorization.ExecuteWithPrivileges` returns -60031 #12409
  • Button Text wrap #9102

Created
